snippet.title: ESCAPE CONDITION Story Trailer | Wishlist on Steam
snippet.description:
"Control AI before it controls you"

A message from the Future Resistance beams into your subconscious, showing you visions of the future. AI will create a world dominated by soulless Megacorporations and tyrannical governments. They're only use for common people is as fodder for data centers and AI training.

Only you, living in the this chaotic era of AI's explosion, can stop it. You are granted powers and the Resistance's insight on which AI branches are crucial to the future. For each branch, you can allow it to release into society while installing it in yourself, or travel to the past to prevent its existence. 

Each choice changes the world you fight for.

Wishlist Escape Condition now on Steam ahead of the first major update.
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1391580/Escape_Condition/?beta=0

#unrealengine #steamgame #indiegame #solodeveloper
